Class: ThemeText

ThemeText()

Theme text component which accepts props

Constructor

new ThemeText()

Properties:
Name Type Description
textColorStateProfile text color state profile which will be applied at runtime
isSelected whether this text is in selected state or not
isDisabled whether this text is in disabled state or not
color if text color state profile is not defined then component uses this field to color the icon. Default is main color
text text to show
style style is applied on image
onPress callback when icon is pressed
fontProfile font profile which will define font size and family
Source:
  • appthemes/components/ThemeText.js, line 27

Methods

render()

Renders the text based on props passed.
